author: amilas
msg: the systemID must be unique to the schema. So for inline schemas we can not use the
baseUri since it is not unique for all the schema. changed to target namespace to make that unique.

author: reinhard
msg: disable this testcase since it  doesn't run through with Java 1.4. The problem is that the included Spring configuration files can't be found. It seems to be a Maven 2/Java 1.4 related problem. I'm not willing to invest anymore time into this and for that reason I disable the test for the release. Java 1.4  support is really a PITA because any of the committers seems to use it and then it's me who has to deal with that problems.

author: jstrachan
msg: fix to generate the META-INF/maven/dependencies.properties file on shared libraries too
